meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling a horse or the horse family.
meanings.sent1: The equine features of the statue made it look like a horse.
meanings.sent2: The farm had many equine animals, including horses and ponies.
meanings.sent3: The equine painting in the gallery was a horse with a top hat.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful and swift as an equine in full gallop.
meanings.sent5: The equine beauty of the landscape took my breath away.

meanings.definition: A horse or other member of the horse family.
meanings.sent1: The equine trotted gracefully around the field.
meanings.sent2: She loved spending time with her equine friends at the ranch.
meanings.sent3: The equine in the race wore a funny costume and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The majestic equine stood proudly in the meadow, a symbol of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The young girl's dream was to own her own equine someday.
